itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss UFC 252 results, why Ross is betting that the Lakers will be bounced in the first round of the NBA playoffs, why the BIG Ten got it wrong, how good will Luka Doncic be for the Mavericks, and why the pussification of sports has continued with the Fernando Tatis Jr. controversy.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss UFC 252 results, why Ross is betting that the Lakers will be bounced in the first round of the NBA playoffs, why the BIG Ten got it wrong, how good will Luka Doncic be for the Mavericks, and why the pussification of sports has continued with the Fernando Tatis Jr. controversy.
